name: Anidvonia
description:
A game jam was made for Metroidvania month 16.

The player can summon a water ball and it will change depending on the interaction.

exp: run at water ball will heal, attack with sword will change to slash wave.

[Input]

WASD: Move

J: attack

Space: jump

Shift : dash/air dash( if unlock)

E: switch weapon

K: summon water ball
